original_title: 秘密捜査官の女 被虐の巨乳エージェント
overview: Sora Aoi is a Secret Investigator, entrusted with state secrets. When her beloved partner is taken as a hostage, she heads to the captor’s hideout alone, a cruel fate lies in wait for both them…being tied up and sexually tortured. Getting face fucked until they cry. Hung up at gunpoint! Knocked out with drugs and forced to cum. Her mind and body are ruined with drugs and she is reduced to a debauched bitch…
title: Secret Woman Investigator: Agent With Big Tits
